org.gvsig.raster.cache.tile.impl.pool

Class ThreadPoolImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.cache.tile.impl.pool.ThreadPoolImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadPool

    public class ThreadPoolImpl
extends Object
implements ThreadPool
    Pool of threads. This class contains a list of tasks and a limited number of threads to execute them. When a thread is free will execute the next task in the list.
